abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews Mac Wellman play 3 2's; or AFAR, directed by Meghan Finn and starring Quinlan Corbett and Jocelyn Kuritsky at Dixon Place.
snippet: Mac Wellman’s enigmatic play “3 2’s; or AFAR” covers ground from physical theater to Heidegger at Dixon Place.
lead_paragraph: Mac Wellman’s enigmatic play “3 2’s; or AFAR” covers ground from physical theater to Heidegger at Dixon Place.

headline.main: A Staged Enigma That Numbers Among Its Characters Something/Nothings
headline.print_headline: A Staged Enigma That Numbers Among Its Characters Something/Nothings
headline.seo: ‘3 2’s,’ by Mac Wellman, at Dixon Place - Review
